unnormalised: FYI, the Q3 report shows a 12% increase in revenue compared to last year, but operating expenses also rose by 8.5%, so the net profit margin is only up by 3%. Investors should keep an eye on these numbers, especially considering the projected 15% growth in marketing spend for FY25.
normalised: F-Y-I, the Q-three report shows a twelve percent increase in revenue compared to last year, but operating expenses also rose by eight point five percent, so the net profit margin is only up by three percent. Investors should keep an eye on these numbers, especially considering the projected fifteen percent growth in marketing spend for F-Y-twenty five.
